item.title: Build homepage on Github pages with Hugo Framework
item.description: Instruction I built we homepage hosted in the Github pages. The framework I use is Hugo. Create static website with Hugo Hugo is used to generate hugo new -yaml Theme Hugo has lots of themes for the website. For this website I choose PaperMod. It has very simple and clean pages. Github The benifits of deploying the static website are: It’s free. It’s fast enough for a homepage.
